PDEBox¶

Folder where all PDE equations for use with PINNs are placed .. _PDEbox:

Reynolds-Averaged Navier Stokes(RANS) equations¶

The RANS equations are used to solve for mean flow. Several formulations are applied to account for the unclosed nature:

The RST-E formulation is the most basic fromulation of the RANS equations and is defined as:

\[\frac{\partial U_{i}}{\partial x_{i}} = 0,\]
\[U_{j}\frac{\partial U_{i}}{\partial x_{j}} + \frac{1}{\rho}\frac{\partial P}{\partial x_{j}} + \frac{\partial (2\nu S_{ij})}{\partial x_{j}} + f_{p,i},\]

where the mean strain rate tensor is defined as:

\[S_{ij} = \frac{1}{2}(\frac{\partial U_{i}}{\partial x_{j}} + \frac{\partial U_{j}}{\partial x_{i}})\]
src.PINNBox.PDEBox.RANS.RANS_B_RSTE(rho, nu, fp)[source]¶

Return PDE for RANS with RST-E formulation.

Parameters:

  • rho (float) – Fluid Density.

  • nu (float) – Fluid Kinematic Viscosity.

  • fp (float or tf.Variable) – Streamwise Body Forcing.

Returns:

PDE operator to calculate residual of continuity, x-momentum and y-momentum

Return type:

func

The HD formulation (without turbulence modelling) splits the Reynolds forcing (divergence of Reynolds stress) into a potential and solenoidal part such that the RANS equations now appear as:

\[\frac{\partial U_{i}}{\partial x_{i}} = 0,\]
\[U_{j}\frac{\partial U_{i}}{\partial x_{j}} + \frac{1}{\rho}\frac{\partial (P - \phi)}{\partial x_{j}} + \frac{\partial (2\nu S_{ij})}{\partial x_{j}} + f_{s,i} + f_{p,i},\]
\[\frac{\partial f_{s,i}}{\partial x_{i}} = 0,\]
src.PINNBox.PDEBox.RANS.RANS_B_HD(rho, nu, fp)[source]¶

Return PDE for RANS with HD formulation and no turbulence model.

Parameters:

  • rho (float) – Fluid Density.

  • nu (float) – Fluid Kinematic Viscosity.

  • fp (float or tf.Variable) – Streamwise Body Forcing.

Returns:

PDE operator to calculate residual of continuity, x-momentum, y-momentum and divergence of solenoidal forcing.

Return type:

func

One can also augment the RANS equations with a turbulence model:

\[\frac{\partial U_{i}}{\partial x_{i}} = 0,\]
\[U_{j}\frac{\partial U_{i}}{\partial x_{j}} + \frac{1}{\rho}\frac{\partial (P - \phi)}{\partial x_{j}} + \frac{\partial 2(\nu + \nu_{t}) S_{ij}}{\partial x_{j}} + f_{s,i} + f_{p,i},\]
\[\frac{\partial f_{s,i}}{\partial x_{i}} = 0,\]
\[U_{j}\frac{\partial \tilde{\nu}}{\partial x_{j}} + S_{p} + S_{d} + S_{c} + S_{diff} = 0.\]
src.PINNBox.PDEBox.RANS.RANS_SA_HD(rho, nu, minS, fp)[source]¶

Return PDE for RANS with HD formulation and Spalart-Allmaras turbulence model.

Parameters:

  • rho (float) – Fluid Density.

  • nu (float) – Fluid Kinematic Viscosity.

  • minS (float) – Minimum value of mean strain rate tensor to prevent division by 0.

  • fp (float or tf.Variable) – Streamwise Body Forcing.

Returns:

PDE operator to calculate residual of continuity, x-momentum, y-momentum, divergence of solenoidal forcing, Spalart-Allmaras transport equation and L2 norm of solenoidal forcing.

Return type:

func
